The protagonist of a fantasy novel who discovers they have the power to control time and must use it to save their world from destruction.
A detective in a hard-boiled noir novel who is trying to solve a series of gruesome murders that seem connected to a secret government experiment.
A magical creature in a children's book who helps a young human on a quest to find their missing family and restore peace to their kingdom.
A historical figure in a biographical novel who overcomes incredible obstacles to achieve greatness and leave a lasting legacy.
A scientist in a science fiction novel who creates a machine that can travel through parallel universes, but soon realizes the consequences of meddling with the fabric of reality.
